name: RendezVous353
overview:
RendezVous353.com, the Global Irish, and Irish connected Business & Social networking website.

The aim of RendezVous353.com is to connect, inform and entertain and to facilitate the sharing of knowledge, job opportunities and networking among all people with an Irish connection around the world.

It’s founded by Terry McLoughlin, originally from County Mayo and a Chartered Surveyor and member of the Royal Institute of Chartered Surveyors, and Limerick-based Richard Oâ€™Donnell, a “dot com” multimillionaire via the sale of Software Architects International in 2000.

The RendezVous353 name uses the universally recognised word for â€œmeetingâ€, combined with the international dialling code for the Republic of Ireland. The networking website is aimed at the 80m strong global Irish Diaspora.
